product_description:
(This is an insurance product)

 

A unique, non-participating endowment plan that helps you achieve your saving goals with guaranteed returns and guaranteed protection.

(This is a takaful product)

 

Make your Hajj aspirations a reality with Takaful Suria Plus. A comprehensive plan from as low as RM150 a month, complete with a variety of protection and savings benefits. All to help you and your loved ones prepare for the holy pilgrimage.

(This is a takaful product)

 

A regular contribution surplus sharing universal takaful plan that helps you achieve financial security for yourself and your loved ones. More importantly, it is designed to achieve complete religious peace of mind throughout your life as well as afterlife.

(This is an insurance product)

 

SunLink Max is an investment-linked insurance plan that provides comprehensive coverage that lasts a lifetime.

(This is a takaful product)

 

SunLink Istismar Plus is a regular contribution investment-linked takaful plan that provides comprehensive coverage.

(This is an insurance product)

 

Enjoy comprehensive protection while growing your wealth. SunInvest is a single-premium investment-linked plan that offers the best of both insurance protection and investment, up to the age of 99.

(This is a takaful product)

 

A single contribution plan that offers two in one plan – investment and takaful coverage

(This is an insurance product)

 

Plan to retire in style with a guaranteed yearly income, insurance coverage and potential investment returns, in addition to the savings you have for your golden years.

(This is an insurance product)

 

As a parent, one of the best things you can give your child is a good education. That’s why it’s vital to plan ahead with the right education savings plan like Sun EduSmart, a unique non-participating endowment plan.

(This is a takaful product)

 

Sun Ultimate Coverage-i is a surplus sharing single/regular contribution term plan that suits for Small and Medium Enterprise (SME)/Commercial clients and high net worth (preferred client) segments who are looking for takaful coverage as income protection, estate liquidity, business continuation, financing protection and estate distribution.

(This is a takaful product)

 

Sun Inspirasi is a surplus sharing universal takaful plan that provides coverages like hibah (gift of love) with high takaful coverage amount on death and total and permanent disability (TPD), up to 3 times additional payout on accidental death, up to RM2 million non-medical limit, cash payout benefit, flexible contribution payment term and contract term and maturity benefit.

(This is a takaful product)

 

A monthly renewable group family takaful term plan with surplus sharing that provides lump sum death and total and permanent disability (TPD) benefit due to all causes. It will be offered on pay as you go (PAYG) basis.

 

Note: Click on “APPLY NOW” will redirect you to Sun Life Malaysia Takaful Berhad website and CIMB Group’s Privacy Policy will cease to apply.

(This is a takaful product)

 

A surplus sharing individual hospitalization and surgical takaful plan which provides for expenses on hospitalization, surgical, non-surgical and other related cost incurred due to injury or illnesses. This product offers 6 plans with different level of deductible to supplement the person covered existing medical insurance/takaful plan, including the medical insurance/takaful coverage provided by employer.

(This is an insurance product)

 

Protection that stacks up with guaranteed cash returns every year.

(This is an insurance product)

 

Protect your loved ones with Sun Signature Life Plus. A non-participating universal life plan that takes care of your commitments should anything happen to you.

(This is a takaful product)

 

Savings and Protection that grow together

(This is an insurance product)

 

Limited pay investment-linked plan with 20 years coverage.

(This is a takaful product)

 

Regular contribution investment-linked takaful plan that helps you expand your wealth and legacy during your lifetime and safeguard your loved ones.

(This is a takaful product)

 

Surplus sharing regular contribution universal takaful plan that secures your legacy and/or business during your lifetime.
Provides coverage against unforeseen mechanical & electrical component failures of your used vehicle.

product_name: IKHLAS Private Car Comprehensive Plus Takaful
product_description:
Provide road tax service with motor takaful quotation at one go. A Shariah compliant plan with complimentary RM10,000 Personal Accident, all authorized drivers automatically cover and complimentary 24 hours Bantuan Ikhlas Road Assist Service. 6 month or 12 months 0% instalment plan is made available. 

 

Note: Click on "GET A QUOTE ONLINE" to be directed to Takaful Ikhlas General Berhad's website. Thereafter, CIMB Group Privacy Policy will cease to apply.
With PPG Insurance, your car's value will remain the same for up to 5 years in the event of total loss due to accidental damage, fire and/or theft.

Enjoy comprehensive coverage for your private vehicles with enhanced coverage such as special perils for natural disaster, and many more!

 

 Note : Click on ‘GET A QUOTE ONLINE’ to direct you to Berjaya Sompo Insurance Berhad website. Thereafter, CIMB Group Privacy Policy will cease to apply.

Travel worry-free with improved coverage and a fully-enhanced plan from as low as RM39.


Note : Click on ‘GET A QUOTE ONLINE’ to direct you to Berjaya Sompo Insurance Berhad website. Thereafter, CIMB Group Privacy Policy will cease to apply.

Travel to domestic or international locations with peace of mind with COVID-19 coverage and a fully-enhanced plan from as low as RM13.


Note : Click on ‘GET A QUOTE ONLINE’ to direct you to Berjaya Sompo Insurance Berhad website. Thereafter, CIMB Group Privacy Policy will cease to apply.

A comprehensive insurance plan cover up to RM1.2mil for accidental death and permanent disablement due to snatch; it also covers medical expenses, daily hospital income, loss of cash withdrawn from ATM and personal belonging, unauthorized transaction Touch 'n Go of e-wallet/bank accounts, car loan outstanding balance and domestic travel inconveniences. Everything from just less than RM1.10 per day!


Note : Click on ‘GET A QUOTE ONLINE’ to direct you to Berjaya Sompo Insurance Berhad website. Thereafter, CIMB Group Privacy Policy will cease to apply.

Snatch Guard Plus provides compensation for the loss of or damage to Personal Effects, cash loss as a result of Snatch Theft or Attempted Snatch Theft occurring within 24 hours of ATM withdrawal, hospitalisation income and bodily injury caused during the Snatch Theft or Attempted Snatch Theft.

Get protected from snatch thefts and attempted snatch thefts, wherever and whenever you are, from as low as RM1 a month.

Note : Click on ‘GET A QUOTE ONLINE’ to direct you to Berjaya Sompo Insurance Berhad website. Thereafter, CIMB Group Privacy Policy will cease to apply.
Insurance coverage on your housing loan outstanding based on reducing term should unexpected events happen to you.
Insurance coverage on your housing loan outstanding based on level term should unexpected events happen to you.
Takaful coverage for your home financing based on reducing term should unexpected events happen to you.
A Takaful plan for Term Financing-i secured by ASB Certificate.
Enjoy financial security and peace of mind with Credit Protector Plus.
Get insurance protection when you take up personal loan with CIMB Bank Berhad.
Exclusively for those who have taken the Amanah Saham Bumiputra loan, Group Amanah Saham Assurance is a single premium reducing term plan covering Death and Total and Permanent Disability (TPD).
Leave a legacy of ownership to your loved ones with this product which is offered to customers who take up hire purchase loan with CIMB Bank.

A surplus sharing single contribution reducing term plan that offers protection to help ease your family member from financial burden by offsetting against the outstanding of your hire purchase financing facility.
Gain peace of mind with coverage on your residential building, contents and personal effects.
Coverage for your building and its contents due to unforeseen events or other perils.

Most home owners have insurance to cover the building that they live in, however, they often overlook the need to cover the contents in their home.

Secure Home is an insurance plan that covers your household goods and personal effects against loss or damage by all risks, including fire, flood, lightning, theft or accidents. In addition, it also offers full theft cover.

Note : Click on ‘GET A QUOTE ONLINE’ to direct you to Berjaya Sompo Insurance Berhad website. Thereafter, CIMB Group Privacy Policy will cease to apply.

Cover your home and the personal belongings in your house against loss or damage due to fire, lightning, explosions, flood, bursting of water pipes and other perils stated in the Takaful Certificate schedule.
